subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Cristiano Ronaldo scored an 88th-minute penalty to give Manchester United a 2-1 victory against Everton at Old Trafford. The victory kept United within a point of Arsenal, the Premier League leader.Arsenal, which beat Tottenham Hotspur, 2-1, on Saturday, leads the standings with 43 points. United has 42, and Chelsea is third with 34.
